CustomField.formula: IF (OR(ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Config2__Status__c, "Draft"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Config2__Status__c, "In Amendment"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Config2__Status__c, "Pending Cancellation")), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus_Config2__CustomerPOAccept?id="&Id, IMAGE("/resource/Apttus_Config2__Button_Accept", "Accept"),"_self"), NULL)
CustomField.label: Accept
